title: Education for College Students
description: A platform that provides online courses and internships to college students, with a focus on practical skills and real-world experience
problem: College students are often scammed by companies offering fake internships, and they lack practical skills and real-world experience
solution: The platform offers legitimate internships and courses, with a focus on practical skills and real-world experience, and provides feedback and support to students
business_model: The platform generates revenue through course fees, and offers a 'friends combo' discount for students who sign up with their friends
differentiator: Focus on practical skills and real-world experience, and personalized support and feedback
vision: To provide high-quality education and job opportunities to college students, and to become a leading online education platform
